# yield_temp_US: Objective

Objective is to do a yields on GDD analysis, following in spirit the analysis by RObert and Schlenker.

1. A first part of the project contains GDD code, trying various method, including code by Thor.

2. Second party contains pure weather/GDD data, either from M Gammans, or pulled from Earth Engine.
